title: Handmade Pottery
details: Beautifully crafted pottery items including vases, bowls, and mugs made by local artisans.

title: Knitted Scarves
details: Warm and cozy scarves knitted with love using high-quality yarn in various colors and patterns.

title: Watercolor Paintings
details: A collection of stunning watercolor paintings featuring landscapes, florals, and abstract designs.

title: Handcrafted Jewelry
details: Unique and stylish jewelry pieces including necklaces, bracelets, and earrings made with natural materials.
